downloadTitle: Hotfix for Microsoft Application Request Routing Version 2.5 for IIS7 (KB 2732764) (x86)
downloadDescription: Hotfix for Microsoft Application Request Routing Version 2.5 for IIS7 (KB 2732764) (x86)
detailsSection: This hotfix addresses a problem in Application Request Routing Version 2.5. When ARR is installed on Windows Server 2012, it fails to proxy Windows authentication. More details information about this hotfix is in the Microsoft Knowledge Base article, KB2732764.
systemRequirementsSection:
• Supported Operating Systems: Windows Server 2012
  • This update applices to the following product: Microsoft Application Request Routing Version 2.5 for IIS7.
installInstructionSection:
Click the Download button on this page to start the download, then do one of the followings:
  • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
  • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, clieck Save or Save this program to disk.
